Objective: 
Enthusiastic and dedicated business development professional with a strong 
foundation in sales, marketing, and customer relationship management. Eager to 
leverage my skills and passion for growth in a new Business Development role, where I 
can contribute to the success of the team and the company. Skills: 
 
1. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal. 2. Strong research, negotiation, and problem-solving abilities. 3. Familiarity with CRM software (HubSpot, Pipedrive) and Microsoft Office Suite. 4. Ability to analyze market trends, customer needs, and competitive landscapes. 5. Experience in developing and executing targeted sales campaigns. 6. 6.
